a measure of how often people are clicking on Google advertising products, increased 18 percent compared to one year ago, beating analyst expectations. International sales accounted for 52 percent of the company's revenues. Our strong performance has been driven by a rapidly growing digital economy, continuous product innovation that benefits both users and advertisers, and by the extraordinary momentum of our newer businesses, such as display and mobile, Eric Schmidt said in a statement.
